name: RoboHacker
description:
The description is in the game, so that it will me time here.

Controls:

Menu: Arrow Keys to move and Enter/Shift/Space to select

Game: You type, put a semicolon at the end, and press Enter. The commands are in the game as well.

Try to get the best score!

Link to leaderboards - https://dollarone.games/elympics/submitHighscore?key=RoboHacker&name=put your name here&score=put your score here

Please don't cheat by putting your score high.

Made for the Unijam and MiniLD #72 game jams.

Credits Links -
